our-mission-text: Empowering leaders to make a sustainable and positive impact
our-mission-text-2: within their organizations through high-quality Training & Consultation.
we-are-text: In a world full of challenges and rapid changes, Future Insights Academy stands as the premier destination for executives and aspiring leaders. We are a comprehensive platform dedicated to providing a holistic learning experience and Management consultation that combines theoretical knowledge with practical applications to develop strategic leadership and management skills.
our-vision-text: To become the trusted partner for Leaders and executives in their journey toward excellence and innovation.
partner-text-1: Through a combination of cutting-edge insights, interactive training, and hands-on coaching,
partner-text-2: we partner with executives and organizations to build stronger leadership
partner-text-3: , maximize performance, and unlock future growth opportunities.

refund-policy-description: At Future Insights, we are committed to providing high-quality training, workshops, and coaching sessions. We understand that circumstances may change, and we strive to maintain a fair and transparent refund policy.
refund-policy-1-description: Refund eligibility depends on the type of service purchased:
refund-policy-1.1-desc-1: Cancellation at least 10 days before the start date.
refund-policy-1.1-desc-2: Cancellation between 7-10 days before the start date.
refund-policy-1.1-desc-3: Cancellation less than 7 days before the start date. Registration transfer is available.
refund-policy-1.2-desc-1: Cancellation at least 7 days before the start date.
refund-policy-1.2-desc-2: Cancellation between 3-7 days before the start date.
refund-policy-1.2-desc-3: Cancellation less than 3 days before the start date.
refund-policy-2-description-1: Participants may reschedule or receive a full refund.
refund-policy-2-description-2: If postponed, participants may transfer registration or receive a refund.
refund-policy-3-description-1-1: Refund requests must be emailed to
refund-policy-3-description-2: Approved refunds will be processed within 7-10 business days.
refund-policy-4-description-1: Failure to attend live sessions without cancellation.
refund-policy-4-description-2: Dropping out after a workshop has started.
refund-policy-5-description: For any refund-related inquiries, please contact:
privacy-policy-1-desc-1-2: Name, email, contact details, and payment information.
privacy-policy-1-desc-2-2: Pages visited, time spent on the platform, and interactions.
privacy-policy-1-desc-3-2: Used to enhance user experience and track engagement.
privacy-policy-2-desc-1: To provide and improve our learning services.
privacy-policy-2-desc-2: To process payments and manage subscriptions.
privacy-policy-2-desc-3: To communicate updates, promotions, and essential service messages.
privacy-policy-3-desc-1: We implement strict security measures to protect user data.
privacy-policy-3-desc-2: Payment transactions are encrypted and processed by third-party payment providers.
privacy-policy-4-desc-1: We do not sell user data to third parties.
privacy-policy-4-desc-2: Data may be shared with educational partners and payment processors when necessary.
privacy-policy-5-desc-1: Users can request access, modification, or deletion of their personal data.
privacy-policy-5-desc-2: Users may opt-out of marketing communications at any time.
terms-1-desc: Welcome to Future Insights, an online Coaching, Training, Consultation Services, and Data-Driven Business Solutions. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do platform.
terms-2-desc-1: Users must provide accurate and up-to-date information during registration.
terms-2-desc-2: Unauthorized use, sharing, or transfer of accounts is strictly prohibited.
terms-2-desc-3: Users must comply with all applicable laws and ethical guidelines when engaging in consulting, coaching, or learning activities.
terms-3-desc-1: All content, including Courses, Consultation Materials, Workshops, and Proprietary Methodologies, is the property of Future Insights or its licensors and is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws.
terms-3-desc-2: Users may not reproduce, distribute, or modify any content without prior written permission.
terms-4-desc-1: Fees for Consultation Services, Coaching Sessions, Online Courses, and Blended Learning Programs must be paid in full before access is granted
terms-4-desc-2-1: Refund will be conducted according to the
terms-4-desc-2-2: and are subject to review based on the service usage and delivery status.
terms-5-desc-1: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms of Use.
terms-5-desc-2: Users may request account deletion at any time. However, refunds will not be issued upon termination unless explicitly stated in the refund policy.
